text: Hello! I need to build a custom module for vertical tabs for a landing page. But I'm severely strugling as this is the first custom module that I'm building. Can anyone guide me as to how to get this done ? I can share my code if needed.

I suggest taking a look at the custom templates in the CMS boilerplate. You get some pretty simple and straight forward code examples there: <https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-theme-boilerplate/tree/master/src/modules> . You can find a general guide here: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/cos-general/create-and-edit-modules> - You might share your code for further help.
Alright, I'll look into them. Thanks <@U014A8JD9DH> !!

We also recommend taking the custom module tutorial to get an understanding of how they work. <https://designers.HubSpot.com/tutorials/getting-started-with-modules|https://designers.HubSpot.com/tutorials/getting-started-with-modules>
